data.actual_result: It prints everything as one line
data.expected_result: It shows as two lines in the overlay
data.short_description: New lines don't work for the chat plugin in Discord StreamKit Overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - go to <https://streamkit.discordapp.com/overlay> and authorize StreamKit - add a Chat Widget, or simply preview it in the given window (Ignore secondary bug where the server/channel addition list gets somewhat blocked by the big 'Off' slider) - Enter added chat room and create a text with two lines
